name: Operation Red
description:
Hello! This is my submission for Fragment Jam  (https://itch.io/jam/fragmentjam)

This is a souls like first person shooter with a low poly western/science fiction aesthetic. This is the final part of a short game jam series which has finally been finished. The goal is to have the story line run  across all three episodes to slowly piece it all together. This game has the character beating three bosses to reach the end game.

I hope you all have fun! And please don't hesitate to give feedback!
